reviewText: In this episode we see the conclusion to the martial arts figure skating competition. After a accident a new couple enters the battle...Ranma & Ryoga. In the second episode it seems as if Ranma has another fiance.  Because Genma thinks with his stomach he sold his new born son Ranma to  some strange guy for a fish and 2 pickels. However the matter does get  resolved during the martial arts romen take out race.
